ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 1154
ygData.msgSnippet: Minkin, Don t forget the power level possibilites that occur becuase of your Singing Steel hat! If you make an eye, its blue to people levels 1-4  =D thus they
ygData.messageBody:
Minkin,

Don't forget the power level possibilites that occur becuase of your Singing
Steel hat!

If you make an eye, its blue to people levels 1-4 =D
thus they get exp from it! /cackle

I use the helm to make something for necros to lifetap to heal themselves.
Nice in dungeons where that orc pawn isnt available for a huge lifetap.

Plus, in inky (dark elf) form, the 'horny green hat' draws lots of comments too
;)

Frashii 'It aint easy, being green' Allegropaw
52 'Raw Bambooed' bard, Warders of Magic, Tarew Marr

> From: "Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...>
> Subject: bards in guilds...

[...] Snip

> P.S. got my ss helm, in a weird way, im kinda happy the effect doesnt work
> for me yet. I cant wait to see myself in imbrued/ss together, i think the
> green and yellow look cool together.
>
> "you have slain an Eye of Minkin" *sigh*
>
> Minkin
> Valorium
> Sol Ro
